title: Darkest Dungeon II
notes: Native controller support **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Adventure, Strategy, Turn-based strategy, Indie, Tactical
description: The eagerly awaited follow-up to Red Hook's smash hit gothic horror RPG! DDII will test your mettle and drive you to the brink of madness.
